job.title: Embedded Software Engineer
job.description: pAs a Software Engineer you will work with a premier team developing and deploying new technologies on a nextgeneration satellite network ppbrppThe groundbreaking satellite network is redefining what is possible with satellitebased internet service requiring you to innovate design and develop in the world of secure softwaredefined satellite communicationppbrppViasats unique position as a service provider and equipment manufacturer allows you to experience the whole life cycle of networking software development  all the way from design to deploymentppbrppstrongRequirementsstrongpulli5 years of software engineering experience with coding and debugging skills in C and C on LinuxliliExperience with encryption and authentication softwareliliExperience with OpenSSL crypto librariesliliExperience with bash and Python scripting in LinuxliliPossess a DevOps approachliliUp to 20 travel to Carlsbad CA if not currently in the arealiulpbrppstrongPreferencesstrongpulliDeep knowledge of OS features like Multithreading synchronization memory management and networking on Linux or Linuxlike Operating systemsliliExperience with Linux device driver design development and test in addition to kernel crypto moduleliliExperience with implementing REST APIs and working with JSON preferably in C or CliliExperience configuringdebugging embedded HTTPS serversliliBackground in data structures and algorithm designliliProficient in software development tools source code control environmentliliExperience designing and implementing networking protocols at the phy mac transport and application layersliliExperience working in an Agile  Scrum development environmentliliExperience with modern updates to the C language C14liliExperience with ARM53 CPUsliliExperience with ARM TrustZoneliliExperience with TLS protocolsliulpp
